languages.text: {n}Некоторое время регент хранит молчание.{/n} "Мы бы солгали, признай ваше изречение ложным. Долгие годы нам удавалось поддерживать хрупкий баланс внутри Дома, однако... отбытие {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатора{/g} сильно пошатнуло веру некоторых из нас".

traits.locale_text: {n}Некоторое время регент хранит молчание.{/n} "Мы бы солгали, признай ваше изречение ложным. Долгие годы нам удавалось поддерживать хрупкий баланс внутри Дома, однако... отбытие {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатора{/g} сильно пошатнуло веру некоторых из нас".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}The regent stays silent and then replies.{/n} "To call your statement false would be a lie. For many years, we managed to maintain the fragile balance within our House, but then... The {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}'s departure shook the faith of many."
languages.original_text: {n}Некоторое время регент хранит молчание.{/n} "Мы бы солгали, признай ваше изречение ложным. Долгие годы нам удавалось поддерживать хрупкий баланс внутри Дома, однако... отбытие {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатора{/g} сильно пошатнуло веру некоторых из нас".

traits.locale_text: {n}The regent stays silent and then replies.{/n} "To call your statement false would be a lie. For many years, we managed to maintain the fragile balance within our House, but then... The {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}'s departure shook the faith of many."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}摄政王沉默半晌，之后开了口。{/n}“如果我们说实际上并非如此，那恐怕是在说谎。这么多年来，我们一直努力维持着家族内部脆弱的平衡，可后来……{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}大族长{/g}的离去，动摇了很多人的信心。”
languages.original_text: {n}The regent stays silent and then replies.{/n} "To call your statement false would be a lie. For many years, we managed to maintain the fragile balance within our House, but then... The {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}'s departure shook the faith of many."

traits.locale_text: {n}摄政王沉默半晌，之后开了口。{/n}“如果我们说实际上并非如此，那恐怕是在说谎。这么多年来，我们一直努力维持着家族内部脆弱的平衡，可后来……{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}大族长{/g}的离去，动摇了很多人的信心。”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}El regente guarda silencio un momento y responde.{/n} «Negar su declaración sería mentir. Durante muchos años, hemos mantenido un delicado equilibrio en nuestra casa, pero... la marcha de la {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} hizo que la fe de muchos se tambaleara».
languages.original_text: {n}The regent stays silent and then replies.{/n} "To call your statement false would be a lie. For many years, we managed to maintain the fragile balance within our House, but then... The {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}'s departure shook the faith of many."

traits.locale_text: {n}El regente guarda silencio un momento y responde.{/n} «Negar su declaración sería mentir. Durante muchos años, hemos mantenido un delicado equilibrio en nuestra casa, pero... la marcha de la {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} hizo que la fe de muchos se tambaleara».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}摂政はしばらく黙った後、こう答えた。{/n}「あなたの言うことが嘘だとは言えない。何年もの間、我々はどうにか家の中の危ういバランスを保ってきた。{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}ノベイター{/g}の離脱は多くの人々の信頼を揺るがしたのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The regent stays silent and then replies.{/n} "To call your statement false would be a lie. For many years, we managed to maintain the fragile balance within our House, but then... The {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}'s departure shook the faith of many."

traits.locale_text: {n}摂政はしばらく黙った後、こう答えた。{/n}「あなたの言うことが嘘だとは言えない。何年もの間、我々はどうにか家の中の危ういバランスを保ってきた。{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}ノベイター{/g}の離脱は多くの人々の信頼を揺るがしたのだ」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}Der Regent schweigt und antwortet dann.{/n} "Eure Aussage falsch zu nennen, wäre gelogen. Viele Jahre ist es uns gelungen, in unserem Haus ein zerbrechliches Gleichgewicht zu bewahren, doch dann ... hat die Abreise der {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novatorin{/g} den Glauben vieler erschüttert."
languages.original_text: {n}The regent stays silent and then replies.{/n} "To call your statement false would be a lie. For many years, we managed to maintain the fragile balance within our House, but then... The {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}'s departure shook the faith of many."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Regent schweigt und antwortet dann.{/n} "Eure Aussage falsch zu nennen, wäre gelogen. Viele Jahre ist es uns gelungen, in unserem Haus ein zerbrechliches Gleichgewicht zu bewahren, doch dann ... hat die Abreise der {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novatorin{/g} den Glauben vieler erschüttert."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}Le régent garde un instant le silence avant de répondre :{/n} « Ce serait mentir que de prétendre le contraire. Nous avons réussi à maintenir un fragile équilibre au sein de notre maison pendant des années, mais... nombre d'entre nous ont été ébranlés jusque dans leur foi par le départ de la {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The regent stays silent and then replies.{/n} "To call your statement false would be a lie. For many years, we managed to maintain the fragile balance within our House, but then... The {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}'s departure shook the faith of many."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le régent garde un instant le silence avant de répondre :{/n} « Ce serait mentir que de prétendre le contraire. Nous avons réussi à maintenir un fragile équilibre au sein de notre maison pendant des années, mais... nombre d'entre nous ont été ébranlés jusque dans leur foi par le départ de la {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}Naip sessizleşiyor, ardından yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Söylediklerinizin yanlış olduğunu iddia etmek yalan olurdu. Yıllardır Hanemiz içindeki kırılgan dengeyi korumaya çalışıyoruz ancak {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Rota Reisi'nin{/g} vefatı, birçoklarının inancının sarsılmasına neden oldu."
languages.original_text: {n}The regent stays silent and then replies.{/n} "To call your statement false would be a lie. For many years, we managed to maintain the fragile balance within our House, but then... The {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}'s departure shook the faith of many."

traits.locale_text: {n}Naip sessizleşiyor, ardından yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Söylediklerinizin yanlış olduğunu iddia etmek yalan olurdu. Hane'miz içindeki kırılgan dengeyi korumaya yıllardır çalışıyoruz ancak {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Rota Reisi{/g}'nin ayrılması birçoklarının inancının sarsılmasına neden oldu."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
